title: Vivian
description:
From loss breeds new beginnings...Â 
Vivian Monroe had been jaded. Her husband's death only compounded the lies she'd only come to learn about.Clayton North knows a thing or two about loss. He figured it was fate for him to meet Vivian Monroe. He'll take on the challenge of helping her mend her heart.Midst new friendships and new romance, Vivian must let go of her pain and face the woman who helped Adam Monroe weave his deceptive web.
author: Bernadette Marie
